sentences.sContent: While previous jobs that use these stages will continue to run, you should use the new functionality because it has superior productivity and performance.
sentences.sContent_eng: While previous jobs that use these stages will continue to run, you should use the new functionality because it has superior productivity and performance.
sentences.sCn: 在使用这些阶段的以前作业将继续运行时，您应该使用新的功能，因为其具有优越的生产率和性能。

sentences.sContent: She has a teenage daughter from a previous marriage.
sentences.sCn: 她有个出自前一次婚姻的十几岁的女儿。

phrases.pCn: 上一页，前一页；返回上一级菜单
（国会议事程序中作为动议提出的）先决问题

remMethod.val: pre(前) + vi(道路) + ous → 一直走在道路前面的 → 在…之前， 先的

trans.tranOther: A previous event or thing is one that happened or existed before the one that you are talking about
